00047         private function rechercheFils($pid_parent)
00048         {
00049                 $tableau = array(); //tableau contenant tous les sous-dossiers trouvés...
00050                 
00051                 $tableau_temp = array(); //tableau intermédiaire contenant les sous-dossiers à stocker
00052                 
00053                 //Requête pour trouver tous les sous-dossiers du dossier courant
00054                 $select_fields_pid = 'pages.uid';
00055                 $from_table_pid = 'pages';
00056                 $where_clause_pid = 'pages.pid='.$pid_parent;
00057                 $groupBy_pid = '';
00058                 $orderBy_pid = '';
00059                 $limit_pid = '';
00060 
00061                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_pid, $from_table_pid, $where_clause_pid, $groupBy_pid, $orderBy_pid, $limit_pid);
00062 
00063                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00064                 {
00065                         $pid_courant = $row['uid'];
00066 
00067 
00068                         //On stocke l'uid courant dans le tableau
00069                         $taille_tableau = count($tableau);
00070                                                 
00071                         $tableau[$taille_tableau] = $pid_courant;
00072 
00073                         $tableau_temp = $this->rechercheFils($pid_courant);
00074 
00075                         foreach ($tableau_temp as $value) {
00076                                 $taille_tableau = count($tableau);
00077                                         
00078                                 $tableau[$taille_tableau] = $value;
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081                 return $tableau;
00082         }

00096         private function rechercherUidLangue($uid,$sys_language_uid,$uid_parent,$texte_champ,$table,$nom_champ)
00097         {
00098                 $texte=$texte_champ;
00099                 //On teste si le libellé est déjà dans la bonne langue...
00100                 if ($sys_language_uid<>$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00101                 {
00102                         $uid_recherche=$uid;
00103                         $trouve=false;
00104                         // Si on a l'id du parent
00105                         if($uid_parent<>'0')
00106                         {
00107 
00108                                 //Requête pour trouver les infos du parent
00109                                 $select_fields_uid = $table.'.uid, '.$table.'.sys_language_uid, '.$table.'.'.$nom_champ;
00110                                 $from_table_uid = $table;
00111                                 $where_clause_uid = $table.'.uid='.$uid_parent.' AND '.$table.'.deleted<>1';
00112                                 $groupBy_uid = '';
00113                                 $orderBy_uid = '';
00114                                 $limit_uid = '';
00115 
00116                                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_uid, $from_table_uid, $where_clause_uid, $groupBy_uid, $orderBy_uid, $limit_uid);
00117 
00118                                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00119                                 {
00120                                         if($row['sys_language_uid']==$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00121                                         {
00122                                                 $texte=$row[$nom_champ];
00123                                                 $trouve=true;
00124                                         }
00125                                         else
00126                                         {
00127                                                 $uid_recherche=$row['uid'];
00128                                         }
00129                                 }
00130                         }
00131                         
00132                         if($trouve==false)
00133                         {
00134                                 //Requête pour trouver les infos du parent
00135                                 $select_fields_uid = $table.'.uid, '.$table.'.sys_language_uid, '.$table.'.'.$nom_champ;
00136                                 $from_table_uid = $table;
00137                                 $where_clause_uid = $table.'.l18n_parent='.$uid_recherche.' AND '.$table.'.deleted<>1';
00138                                 $groupBy_uid = '';
00139                                 $orderBy_uid = '';
00140                                 $limit_uid = '';
00141 
00142                                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_uid, $from_table_uid, $where_clause_uid, $groupBy_uid, $orderBy_uid, $limit_uid);
00143 
00144                                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00145                                 {
00146                                         if($row['sys_language_uid']==$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00147                                         {
00148                                                 $texte=$row[$nom_champ];
00149                                         }
00150                                 }
00151                         }
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 return $texte;
00155         }

00165         private function equipe($uid_equipes)
00166         {
00167                         //Création de la contrainte permettant l'affichage que de certains types de postes...
00168                         $equipes='';
00169         
00170 
00171                         if($uid_equipes<>'')
00172                         {
00173                                 $equipes=' AND ( ';
00174                                 $premier=true;
00175 
00176                                 $tableau_equipes = Explode(",",$uid_equipes);
00177 
00178                                 foreach ($tableau_equipes as $equipe_courante) {
00179                                         if ($premier <> true)
00180                                         {
00181                                                 $equipes = $equipes.' OR ';
00182                                         }
00183                                         else
00184                                         {
00185                                                 $premier=false;
00186                                         }
00187                                         $equipes=$equipes.'tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.uid='.$equipe_courante;
00188                                 }
00189 
00190                                 $equipes = $equipes.' )';
00191 
00192                         }
00193 
00194 
00195                         return $equipes;
00196         }

00365         function main($content,$conf)   {
00366                 //Initialisation
00367                 $this->conf=$conf;
00368                 $this->pi_initPIflexForm(); // Init and get the flexform data of the plugin
00369                 
00370                 $this->lConf = array(); // Setup our storage array...
00371                 // Il est possible de récupérer les informations des options du plugin à partir de $this->lConf['nom_de_l_option'];
00372                 
00373                 
00374                 // Assign the flexform data to a local variable for easier access
00375                 $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00376                 
00377                 $piFlexForm = $this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'];
00378                  // Traverse the entire array based on the language...
00379                  // and assign each configuration option to $this->lConf array...
00380                 
00381                 foreach ( $piFlexForm['data'] as $sheet => $data )
00382                 {
00383                         foreach ( $data as $lang => $value )
00384                         {
00385                                 foreach ( $value as $key => $val )
00386                                 {
00387                                         $this->lConf[$key] = $this->pi_getFFvalue($piFlexForm, $key, $sheet);                   
00388 
00389 
00390                                         if(ereg('groupe',$key)){
00391                                                 $temp = $key;
00392                                                 foreach ($val as $key2 => $val2 )
00393                                                 {
00394                                                         $temp = $temp.'/'.$key2;
00395                                                         foreach ($val2 as $key3 => $val3 )
00396                                                         {
00397                                                                 $this->lConf[$key3] = $this->pi_getFFvalue($piFlexForm, $key.'/'.$key2.'/'.$key3, $sheet);
00398                                                         }
00399                                                 }
00400                 
00401                                         
00402                                         }
00403                                 }
00404 
00405                         }
00406 
00407                 }
00408                 
00409                 $this->pi_loadLL();
00410                 
00411                 //Gestion de gabarits (Template)
00412                 $this->templateCode = $this->cObj->fileResource($this->lConf["template_file"]);
00413 
00414                 $template = array();
00415 
00416                 $template['total'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->templateCode, '###TEMPLATE###');
00417                 
00418                 $template['item'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['total'], '###ITEM###');
00419                 
00420 
00421                 $template['publications_par_titres'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###PUBLICATIONS_PAR_TITRES###');
00422                 
00423                 $template['publications_par_titres_publications'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_titres'], '###PUBLICATIONS###');
00424 
00425                 $template['publications_par_titres_auteurs'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_titres_publications'], '###AUTEURS###');
00426                 $template['publications_par_titres_equipes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_titres_publications'], '###EQUIPES###');
00427                 $template['publications_par_titres_themes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_titres_publications'], '###THEMES###');
00428                 $template['publications_par_titres_fichiers'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_titres_publications'], '###FICHIERS###');
00429 
00430                 $template['publications_par_annees'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###PUBLICATIONS_PAR_ANNEES###');
00431                                 
00432                 $template['publications_par_annees_publications'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_annees'], '###PUBLICATIONS###');
00433                 
00434                 $template['publications_par_annees_auteurs'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_annees_publications'], '###AUTEURS###');
00435                 $template['publications_par_annees_equipes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_annees_publications'], '###EQUIPES###');
00436                 $template['publications_par_annees_themes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_annees_publications'], '###THEMES###');
00437                 $template['publications_par_annees_fichiers'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['publications_par_annees_publications'], '###FICHIERS###');
00438                 
00439                 
00440                 //Exemple de création de requêtes
00441                 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00442                 //Création de requête
00443                 $select_fields = '*';
00444                 $from_table = 'test';
00445                 $where_clause = '';
00446                 $groupBy = '';
00447                 $orderBy = 'champ1';
00448                 $limit = '';

00454                         $test = $test.$row['champ1'].' ';
00455                 }
00456                 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00457                 
00458                 //On initialise la requête avec rien...
00459                 $select_fields = '';
00460                 $from_table = '';
00461                 $where_clause = '';
00462                 $groupBy = '';
00463                 $orderBy = '';
00464                 $limit = '';
00465 
00466                 if(($this->lConf['requete'])<>true){
00467 
00468                         // Récupération de toutes les publications à afficher
00469 
00470                         // Construction de la requête
00471                         $select = 'DISTINCT tx_ligestpublications_Publication.uid AS uidpublication, tx_ligestpublications_Publication.*';
00472                         $table = 'tx_ligestpublications_Publication';
00473                         $where = 'tx_ligestpublications_Publication.deleted<>1';
00474 
00475 
00476                         // Gestion du nom de l'Equipe
00477                         $equipes = $this->equipe($this->lConf['equipe']);
00478                         if($equipes<>""){
00479                                 $table = $table.', tx_ligestpublications_Appartenir, tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe';
00480                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Appartenir.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Appartenir.idPublication = tx_ligestpublications_Publication.uid AND tx_ligestpublications_Appartenir.idEquipe = tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.uid';
00481                                 $where = $where.$equipes;
00482                         }
00483 
00484                         
00485                         // Gestion du nom des membres
00486                         $membres = $this->membre($this->lConf['membres']);
00487                         if($membres<>""){
00488                                 $where = $where.' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo, tx_ligestpublications_Auteur, tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur WHERE tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo.uid = tx_ligestpublications_Auteur.idMembreLabo AND tx_ligestpublications_Auteur.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Auteur.uid = tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.idAuteur AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.idPublication = tx_ligestpublications_Publication.uid'.$membres.')';

00490                         
00491                         // Gestion des auteurs
00492                         $auteurs = $this->auteur($this->lConf['auteurs']);
00493                         if($auteurs<>""){
00494                                 $where = $where.' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tx_ligestpublications_Auteur, tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur WHERE tx_ligestpublications_Auteur.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Auteur.uid = tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.idAuteur AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication_Auteur.idPublication = tx_ligestpublications_Publication.uid'.$auteurs.')';

00496                         
00497                         // Gestion des thèmes
00498                         $themes = $this->theme($this->lConf['themes']);
00499                         if($themes<>""){
00500                                 $where = $where.' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tx_ligestpublications_Theme, tx_ligestpublications_Theme_Publication WHERE tx_ligestpublications_Theme.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Theme.uid = tx_ligestpublications_Theme_Publication.idTheme AND tx_ligestpublications_Theme_Publication.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_Theme_Publication.idPublication = tx_ligestpublications_Publication.uid'.$themes.')';

00502

00504                         $types = $this->type($this->lConf['typePublication']);
00505                         if($types<>""){
00506                                 $where = $where.' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tx_ligestpublications_TypePublication WHERE tx_ligestpublications_TypePublication.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestpublications_TypePublication.uid = tx_ligestpublications_Publication.TypePublication'.$types.')';

00508                         
00509

00511                         $datepublication = $this->lConf['datepublication'];
00512 
00513                         if($datepublication=='En Cours')
00514                         {
00515                                 $where = $where.' AND ((tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateDebut<="'.date('Y-m-d').'" AND (tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin>="'.date('Y-m-d').'" OR (tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin="0000-00-00" AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateDebut<>"0000-00-00"))) OR tx_ligestpublications_Publication.Annee='.date('Y').')';
00516                         }
00517                         else if($datepublication=='Terminées')
00518                         {
00519                                 $where = $where.' AND ((tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin<"'.date('Y-m-d').'" AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin<>"0000-00-00") OR (tx_ligestpublications_Publication.Annee<'.date('Y').'))';
00520                         }

00524                         
00525                         $publicationdepuis= $this->lConf['limitationdatedebut'];
00526                         
00527                         if($publicationdepuis<>false)
00528                         {

00533                         
00534                         if($publicationjusquen<>false)
00535                         {
00536                                 $where = $where.' AND ((year(tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin)<="'.$publicationjusquen.'" AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.DateFin<>"0000-00-00") OR (tx_ligestpublications_Publication.Annee<='.$publicationjusquen.'))';
00537                         }
00538                         
00539                         
00540                         // Publication internationale?
00541                         $internationale = $this->lConf['internationale'];
00542 
00543                         if($internationale=="Est nationale")
00544                         {
00545                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.EstInternationale="N"';
00546                         }

00550                         }
00551                         else if($internationale=="Est internationale francophone")

00559 
00560                         if($typeconference=="Conference normale")

00562                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.EstInvite="F"';
00563                         }
00564                         else if($typeconference=="Invite")
00565                         {
00566                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.EstInvite="V"';
00567                         }
00568                         
00569

00571                         // Type de contribution?
00572                         $chapitre = $this->lConf['typecontribution'];
00573 
00574                         if($chapitre=="Acte ou livre ou revue")
00575                         {
00576                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.TypeContribution="E"';

00580                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.TypeContribution="P"';
00581                         }

00585

00591                         {

00593                         }
00594 
00595                         // Est paru?
00596                         $parution = $this->lConf['parution'];
00597 
00598                         if($parution=="Parue")
00599                         {
00600                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.EstParu="V"';
00601                         }
00602                         else if($parution=="En Cours")
00603                         {
00604                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestpublications_Publication.EstParu="E"';
00605                         }

00607

00609                         $anneeparution = $this->lConf['anneeparution'];
00610

00624                         // On récupère tous les sous-dossiers...
00625                         $dossiers = ''; 
00626                         
00627                         $pid = array(); //dossiers sélectionnés
00628                         $pages = array(); //dossiers et sous dossiers...
00629

00631

00637

00639                                         $pages = array_merge($pages,$this->rechercheFils($pid_courant));
00640                                 }
00641                                 
00642                                 foreach ($pid as $value) {
00643                                         $taille_tableau = count($pages);
00644 
00645                                         $pages[$taille_tableau] = $value;
00646                                 }
00647                                 
00648                                 
00649                                 foreach ($pages as $value) {
00650                                         if ($premier == true){
00651                                                 $dossiers = $dossiers.'tx_ligestpublications_Publication.pid='.$value;
00652                                                 $premier = false;
00653                                         }
00654                                         else{
00655                                                 $dossiers = $dossiers.' OR tx_ligestpublications_Publication.pid='.$value;
00656                                         }
00657                                 }
00658 
00659                                 $dossiers = $dossiers.')';
00660                         }
00661 
00662                         $where = $where.$dossiers;
00663
